revision.text: ==Description== '''Shards''' are big items you can mine from the [[Underground]], obtain from Daily Deals, get as [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] loot or trade for with the Hoenn [[Berry Master]]. They can then be used, together with [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}}, to purchase items at [[Shard Trader|Shard Traders]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
